Properties.Description: Response system context(s) for this entity. Format should be: 'key:value,key2:value2,etc'. When this entity speaks, the list of keys & values will be passed to the response rules system.
Name of the filter entity that controls which entities can damage us.
Used to set a non-standard rendering mode on this entity. See also 'FX Amount' and 'FX Color'.
The FX amount is used by the selected Render Mode.
The FX color is used by the selected Render Mode.
Will only be lit by lights affecting this group.
Distance at which the overlay starts to fade (<0 = subtract from fademaxdist).
Maximum distance at which the overlay is visible (0 = don't fade out).

If you specify a fade in the worldspawn, or if the engine is running under low end/medium end/XBox360, then the engine will forcibly fade out props even if fademindist/fademaxdist isn't specified. This scale factor gives you some control over the fade. Using 0 here turns off the forcible fades. Numbers smaller than 1 cause the prop to fade out at further distances, and greater than 1 cause it to fade out at closer distances.
If true, this geometry renders into baked cube maps
How this geometry influences baked lighting.
Name(s) of script files that are executed after all entities have spawned.
The name that other entities refer to this entity by.
If set, the name of a path corner entity that this NPC will walk to, after spawning.
NPCs that are in the same squad (i.e. have matching squad names) will share information about enemies, and will take turns attacking and covering each other.
Hint groups are used by NPCs to restrict their hint-node searching to a subset of the map's hint nodes. Only hint nodes with matching hint group names will be considered by this NPC.
Limits NPC to using specified hint group for navigation requests, but does not limit local navigation.

Properties.FriendlyName: If a Hint Group is specified, whether to also allow the use of generic nodes.

Options.Name: Fall to ground (unchecked means *teleport* to ground)
Efficient - Don't acquire enemies or avoid obstacles
Template NPC (used by npc_maker, will not spawn)
Do Alternate collision for this NPC (player avoidance)
Ignore player push (dont give way to player)
Minimal damage taken from NPCs (1 point per missile)

Properties.Description: Holds the NPC in stasis until specified condition. See also 'Wake Radius' and 'Wake Squad'.
Auto-wake if player within this distance
Wake all of the NPCs squadmates if the NPC is woken
Filter by which to filter potential enemies
Prefer visible enemies, regardless of distance or relationship priority
Scales damage energy when this character is hit by a physics object. With a value of 0 the NPC will take no damage from physics.
Markup volume entity to restrict unit navigation
Specifies if the NPC will spawn as a temporary ragdoll and the behavior after becoming a ragdoll.

Options.Name: Ragdoll and get up when settled

Properties.Description: Specifies if the NPC should be using any algorithm variants when avoiding other NPCs.
Name of an animation to preview in Hammer, does not do anything in game.

InputOutputs.Name: DisableShadow
InputOutputs.Description: Turn shadow off.

InputOutputs.Name: EnableShadow
InputOutputs.Description: Turn shadow on.

InputOutputs.Name: AddContext
InputOutputs.Description: Adds a context to this entity's list of response contexts. The format should be 'key:value'.

InputOutputs.Name: RemoveContext
InputOutputs.Description: Remove a context from this entity's list of response contexts. The name should match the 'key' of a previously added context.

InputOutputs.Name: ClearContext
InputOutputs.Description: Removes all contexts in this entity's list of response contexts.

InputOutputs.Name: SetDamageFilter
InputOutputs.Description: Sets the entity to use as damage filter. Pass in an empty string to clear the damage filter.

InputOutputs.Name: Alpha
InputOutputs.Description: Set the sprite's alpha (0 - 255).

InputOutputs.Name: Color
InputOutputs.Description: Set the sprite's color (R G B).

InputOutputs.Name: RunScriptFile
InputOutputs.Description: Load and execute a script file

InputOutputs.Name: RunScriptCode
InputOutputs.Description: Execute a fragment of script code

InputOutputs.Name: CallScriptFunction
InputOutputs.Description: Call a script function

InputOutputs.Name: CallPrivateScriptFunction
InputOutputs.Description: Calls a script function from this entity's private script scope.

InputOutputs.Name: CallGlobalScriptFunction
InputOutputs.Description: Calls a script function in the global script scope.

InputOutputs.Name: Kill
InputOutputs.Description: Removes this entity from the world.

InputOutputs.Name: KillHierarchy
InputOutputs.Description: Removes this entity and all its children from the world.

InputOutputs.Name: AddOutput
InputOutputs.Description: Adds an entity I/O connection to this entity. Parameter format: outputname>targetname>inputname>parameter>delay>max times to fire (-1 == infinite). Very dangerous, use with care.

InputOutputs.Name: FireUser1
InputOutputs.Description: Causes this entity's OnUser1 output to be fired.

InputOutputs.Name: FireUser2
InputOutputs.Description: Causes this entity's OnUser2 output to be fired.

InputOutputs.Name: FireUser3
InputOutputs.Description: Causes this entity's OnUser3 output to be fired.

InputOutputs.Name: FireUser4
InputOutputs.Description: Causes this entity's OnUser4 output to be fired.

InputOutputs.Name: OnUser1
InputOutputs.Description: Fired in response to FireUser1 input.

InputOutputs.Name: OnUser2
InputOutputs.Description: Fired in response to FireUser2 input.

InputOutputs.Name: OnUser3
InputOutputs.Description: Fired in response to FireUser3 input.

InputOutputs.Name: OnUser4
InputOutputs.Description: Fired in response to FireUser4 input.

InputOutputs.Name: OnKilled
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the entity is killed and removed from the game.

InputOutputs.Name: OnDamaged
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when this NPC takes damage.

InputOutputs.Name: OnDeath
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when this NPC is killed.

InputOutputs.Name: OnHalfHealth
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when this NPC reaches half of its maximum health.

InputOutputs.Name: OnHearWorld
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when this NPC hears a sound (other than combat or the player).

InputOutputs.Name: OnHearPlayer
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when this NPC hears the player.

InputOutputs.Name: OnHearCombat
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when this NPC hears combat sounds.

InputOutputs.Name: OnFoundEnemy
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when this NPC establishes line of sight to its enemy (outputs entity).

InputOutputs.Name: OnLostEnemyLOS
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when this NPC loses line of sight to its enemy.

InputOutputs.Name: OnLostEnemy
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when this NPC loses its enemy. Usually due to the enemy being killed/removed, or because this NPC has selected a newer, more dangerous enemy.

InputOutputs.Name: OnFoundPlayer
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when this NPC establishes line of sight to its enemy, and that enemy is a player (outputs player entity).

InputOutputs.Name: OnLostPlayerLOS
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when this NPC loses line of sight to its enemy, and that enemy is a player.

InputOutputs.Name: OnLostPlayer
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when this NPC loses its enemy, and that enemy was a player. Usually due to the enemy being killed/removed, or because this NPC has selected a newer, more dangerous enemy.

InputOutputs.Name: OnDamagedByPlayer
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when this NPC is hurt by a player.

InputOutputs.Name: OnDamagedByPlayerSquad
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when this NPC is hurt by a player OR by one of the player's squadmates.

InputOutputs.Name: OnDenyCommanderUse
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when this NPC has refused to join the player's squad.

InputOutputs.Name: OnSleep
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when this NPC enters a sleep state.

InputOutputs.Name: OnWake
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when this NPC comes out of a sleep state.

InputOutputs.Name: OnForcedInteractionStarted
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the NPC starts a forced interaction.

InputOutputs.Name: OnForcedInteractionAborted
InputOutputs.Description: Fired when the NPC aborts a forced interaction for some reason (target NPC died, couldn't be pathed to, etc)

InputOutputs.Name: OnForcedInteractionFinished
InputOutputs.Description: NPCs in actbusies can no longer perform dynamic interactions.

InputOutputs.Name: OnUnragdollFinished
InputOutputs.Description: This NPC just finished getting up after being a ragdoll.

InputOutputs.Name: OverrideHealth
InputOutputs.Description: Overrides this entity's health, ignoring max health constraints. This is for prototyping only and all uses of this input should be audited before shipping! Values <=0 are ignored.

InputOutputs.Name: SetRelationship
InputOutputs.Description: Changes this entity's relationship with another entity or class. Format: <entityname/classname> <D_HT/D_FR/D_LI/D_NU> <priority>

InputOutputs.Name: SetEnemyFilter
InputOutputs.Description: Changes this NPC's enemy filter to the named filter.

InputOutputs.Name: SetHealth
InputOutputs.Description: Set this NPC's health.

InputOutputs.Name: SetBodyGroup
InputOutputs.Description: Sets NPC bodygroup. Format is <BodygroupName,index>

InputOutputs.Name: physdamagescale
InputOutputs.Description: Sets the value that scales damage energy when this character is hit by a physics object. NOTE: 0 means this feature is disabled for backwards compatibility.

InputOutputs.Name: Ignite
InputOutputs.Description: Ignite, burst into flames

InputOutputs.Name: IgniteLifetime
InputOutputs.Description: Ignite, with a parameter lifetime.

InputOutputs.Name: IgniteNumHitboxFires
InputOutputs.Description: Ignite, with a parameter number of hitbox fires.

InputOutputs.Name: IgniteHitboxFireScale
InputOutputs.Description: Ignite, with a parameter hitbox fire scale.

InputOutputs.Name: Break
InputOutputs.Description: Break, smash into pieces

InputOutputs.Name: StartScripting
InputOutputs.Description: Enter scripting state. In this state, NPCs ignore a variety of stimulus that would make them break out of their scripts: They ignore danger sounds, ignore +USE, don't idle speak or respond to other NPC's idle speech, and so on.

InputOutputs.Name: StopScripting
InputOutputs.Description: Exit scripting state.

InputOutputs.Name: SetSquad
InputOutputs.Description: Set the name of this NPC's squad. It will be removed from any existing squad automatically. Leaving the parameter blank will remove the NPC from any existing squad.

InputOutputs.Name: Wake
InputOutputs.Description: Wakes up the NPC if it is sleeping.

InputOutputs.Name: ForgetEntity
InputOutputs.Description: Clears out the NPC's knowledge of a named entity.

InputOutputs.Name: GagEnable
InputOutputs.Description: Turn on the NPC Gag flag. NPC won't speak outside of choreographed scenes.

InputOutputs.Name: GagDisable
InputOutputs.Description: Turn off the NPC Gag flag.

InputOutputs.Name: IgnoreDangerSounds
InputOutputs.Description: Ignore danger sounds for the specified number of seconds.

InputOutputs.Name: HolsterWeapon
InputOutputs.Description: Force the NPC to holster their weapon. Ignored if the NPC is scripting, if the NPC's weapon is already holstered, or if the NPC doesn't use weapons.

InputOutputs.Name: HolsterAndDestroyWeapon
InputOutputs.Description: Identical to HolsterWeapon, except the weapon is destroyed once it has been holstered and concealed.

InputOutputs.Name: UnholsterWeapon
InputOutputs.Description: Force the NPC to draw their weapon. Ignored if the NPC is scripting, if the NPC's weapon is already drawn, or if the NPC doesn't use weapons.

InputOutputs.Name: ForceInteractionWithNPC
InputOutputs.Description: Force the NPC to use a dynamic interaction with another NPC. Parameter format: <target NPC name> <dynamic interaction name>

InputOutputs.Name: UpdateEnemyMemory
InputOutputs.Description: Update (or Create) this NPC's memory of an enemy and its location

InputOutputs.Name: BecomeRagdoll
InputOutputs.Description: This NPC will instantly become a ragdoll with ZERO force (just go limp). OnDeath, OnHalfHealth, etc. Outputs will **NOT** BE FIRED.

InputOutputs.Name: BecomeTemporaryRagdoll
InputOutputs.Description: Become a temporary ragdoll that then can be later unrgadolled.

InputOutputs.Name: StopTemporaryRagdoll
InputOutputs.Description: Rise from your grave.

InputOutputs.Name: StopTemporaryRagdollAndSetEnemy
InputOutputs.Description: Rise from your grave to attack an enemy. Animgraph NPCs will turn to face the enemy during their unragdoll. Parameter is the enemy, usually the !activator on the trigger that's firing this input.

InputOutputs.Name: WalkTowardsTarget
InputOutputs.Description: Walks towards a target.

InputOutputs.Name: StartResilientPathFollow
InputOutputs.Description: Walks towards the specified path corner. Will resiliently restart the walk if it's interrupted for any reason.

InputOutputs.Name: SetAnimGraphParameter
InputOutputs.Description: Set an animation graph parameter Format: <name=value>

InputOutputs.Name: SetEasingParameter
InputOutputs.Description: Set an easing parameter Format: <name=value>

InputOutputs.Name: EnableTeleportBuffer
InputOutputs.Description: Enable the teleport buffer around this NPC, if it's been disabled previously.

InputOutputs.Name: DisableTeleportBuffer
InputOutputs.Description: Disable the teleport buffer around this NPC.

InputOutputs.Name: EnableChoreoPhysProxy
InputOutputs.Description: Enable the phys proxy.

InputOutputs.Name: DisableChoreoPhysProxy
InputOutputs.Description: Disable the phys proxy.

InputOutputs.Name: FlyAway
InputOutputs.Description: Forces the bird to fly to a nearby crow flyto hint node.

InputOutputs.Name: FlyPath
InputOutputs.Description: Forces the bird to fly the path, starting with the specified path corner. Bird must have line of sight to the specified path corner.

InputOutputs.Name: FlyToHint
InputOutputs.Description: Forces the bird to fly to the specific crow flyto hint node.
